1351050.name: RPG Maker MZ - MV and MZ Remix Music Pack
1351050.description:
13 selected rearranged music tracks from RPG Maker MV and 13 from RPG Maker MZ with 4 additional brand-new songs are all packed in one awesome music pack!
Music for battles, dungeons, castles, fields, town themes and more for your fantasy RPG Maker journeys!

*******************************************

Music Tracklist（all in ogg and m4a file）

・MVre_Battle2
・MVre_Castle1
